mapper.update:
update customer
customername = #{customername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customerpassword = #{customerpassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
blance = #{blance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
credit = #{credit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where customerid = #{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update customer set customername = #{customername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customerpassword = #{customerpassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, blance = #{blance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, credit = #{credit,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where customerid = #{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
